description: This file initializes a knowledge base with documents and metadata, sets up a vector database, and performs a query using an agent with filtering capabilities. It appears to be part of a backend system for managing and querying document-based knowledge, specifically involving CVs and user metadata.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing a connection to a LanceDB vector database, used for storing and retrieving vectorized data.

classes.name: JSONKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a knowledge base stored in JSON format, supporting document loading and metadata filtering.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that facilitates querying the knowledge base with support for filters and automated response generation.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample data files for knowledge filtering tests.
